channel.title: Players Able to Move Through Walls by Following or Attacking :(
channel.description:
All I'm wondering is how to clip a little section of the map so that if the player clicks to follow a player on the other side and click to attack them, they do not just run over the map and through the walls :) Hope someone can help meh
Thanks, Basak
